content: New blog post! Quick update where I've been and upcoming additions to the site.
New blog post, lost something important at an airport.
Populated changelog retroactively according to Git history. I used the recent redesign as a cut-off point.
Added a basic changelog, should make it easier to see what's changed.
Published the current state of my source shrine.
I was accepted into the Aero Webring! Added the widget to the landing page.
Seems like some of the blog posts aren't getting their date property filled in correctly. I've set them to fixed values manually for now.
Added new blog post: We saw Ado live in Milan
SCMPlayer seems to be scuffed, so I had to remove it for now. Added a blog posts to elaborate.
Update blog post page layout to include some metadata about the post.
I redesigned the site! It should be a lot less bland to look at now. New blog post with the details!
